official_title: A bill to amend the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920 (46 App. U.S.C. 861 et seq.) and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920 to authorize the United States as mortgagee to enforce a preferred mortgage lien in a suit under such Act. Requires the U.S. district court hearing such a suit to either appoint a receiver to operate or supervise the operation of the vessel for which the preferred mortgage lien suit is pending.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920 (46 App. U.S.C. 861 et seq.) and for other purposes.
